Installed this on a new empty partition.
It worked after.... I had really read the instructions.

My mistake was that I did not update the installation with enough updates from Microsoft.
After I went back and picked all of the updates, roughly 60, then the rest of the installation worked fine.

The first CD is bootable so you can install it on a  new clean harddrive.

On the second CD, are a directory, described in the.nfo file with numbered directories 1-4. Just follow what is said or exist in these directories and you have a step-by-step instruction.

The installation worked fine. I failed on getting my Hauppauge HVR-1300 card to work. Missing codecs, can not find drivers etc. But that is a different story.
thank yuo
